Night Shift remains in SUV form and pivots his tires toward Hydras.

"That'=
s right, you don't know what happened do ya?  Tucson's a Prime, he just got=
 himself a sizeable upgrade from the Matrix.  See, with my dual programming=
, I can get the scoop on any faction's business I want.  And the Autobot pr=
ogramming I got, enables me ta find these things out as they happen.  And j=
udgn' by the way my link reacted, you thought Rodimus got big guns?  This g=
uys' packn' more power than two nuclear warheads combined.  C'mon, if ya wa=
nt power, Rodimus ain't the guy ta get it from.  And I'm sure Rodimus would=
 be really interested in tryn' ta take down Tucson Prime, that's if you guy=
s got enough back bone ta do it.  Keep in mind, he's got as much strength a=
s Optimus Prime, and that ain't nothn' ta sneeze at."

While keeping in Dec=
epticon code, he tries to open his Autobot channel to Lord Elder, keeping h=
im informed of his progress.

m Tucson was his black paint job and his accent. He had been manufactured u=

give ya that kinda info."

ain, his tires kick up dust around Scorponok.

ight be time for me ta get new tires."
